name: Malicious Script Execution Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to create backdoors for further exploitation and data exfiltration.

action--f127bcb1-2ac3-4e44-a6ff-3e1f89cb.name: Kill malicious process
action--f127bcb1-2ac3-4e44-a6ff-3e1f89cb.description: Terminate the suspicious process responsible for executing malicious scripts.

action--c94f8e29-ee9c-48ea-bb68-1495d20e.name: Block external IP communications
action--c94f8e29-ee9c-48ea-bb68-1495d20e.description: Block outbound connections to the malicious IP address.

action--d542d42b-cf27-47f8-9c42-1e831cbd.name: Scan system for other malicious artifacts
action--d542d42b-cf27-47f8-9c42-1e831cbd.description: Perform a recursive scan on the entire system to identify other potential threats.

while-condition--repeat-until-scan-clean.name: Repeat scan loop
while-condition--repeat-until-scan-clean.description: Repeat the scanning process until the scan result is clean

connection_established.description: Variable indicating if a connection to an external IP is established.

scan_clean.description: Variable indicating if the system scan is clean.
